name: PrayerUnbornTest
description: USA: The National Day of Prayer for the Unborn is set to Jan 22 as per the 2011 Roman Missal issued by the USCCB, however if it coincides with a Sunday or a Solemnity, it should be moved to Jan 23

assertions.assertion: should not exist before 2011
should not exist before 2011
should not exist before 2011
should fall on expected date January 22
should fall on expected date January 23
assertions.comment: this test is significant since January 22nd falls on a Sunday, so the National Day of Prayer for the Unborn should have been moved to January 23rd
